content.detailedDescription: My son and i were coming home and as we walked up to our rural farm house we noticed somthing to the north behind the grove.  we could not see the exact shape however it appeared to be a rectangle or more of a trapezoid shape since the lights were not at a 90 degree corner.  we could not see the object inside the 4 lights because it was all black but we could tell something was inside those 4 lights because it blocked out the stars behind it as it slowly moved toward the east.  the night was crisp, maybe 20 degrees, clear sky, and no wind.  as it slowly moved the only sound we could hear was the sound of air getting pushed by something massive.  it was out in the field about 1/4 mile and a couple hundred feet above the ground.  it was moving rather slowly and had 4 visible continous lights on each corner.  the brightness of the light looked as though they were a bright star in the distance but we could see it was less than a 1/2 mile away.  it then started to move toward the ne and gained speed as it disappeared into the distance and was masked by the sky full of bright stars.  the following morning i told the story to my in-laws that happened to live on the same farmstead.  they agreed that some strange things were happening last night.  my father-in-law said when he came back from town at about 9:00 pm (5 hours before i arrived) he noticed a bright white light about a mile north from where we both lived across the section.  he said it seemed like a very bright welding light but thought it was unusual that the neighbor would be working that late and the light seemed abnormally bright.  my father-in-law also said that neighbor's dog had somehow broke loose from being chained up and was in our yard abviously scared of something.  this dog still had part of the chain he was dragging.  there had to be some kind of connection between these 3 weird happennings.  after we ate lunch that day (about noon) we sat down and read the des moines register that had the story of the phoenix lights which were observed thursday night!  although the object i witnessed did not look like the phoenix lights, it happened about 24 hrs later.  i would estimate the size of what we saw to be 500-1000 ft wide by 300-500 feet high.  the only sound was that of something massive moving through the calm air.
content.summary: It appeared to be a massive rectangle shape with lights on the corner

content.detailedDescription: This was a documented sighting, this thing stopped traffic on a major street and was seen by many people. i was about 10 years old, on the walk home from the park at 81st. & ashland av. in the ideal food mart parking lot behind where i lived @ 8139 marshfield there was 4 of us and we herd the sound of drivers on ashland av slamming on the brakes we turned around and saw a very large craft at about 300 feet off the ground moving very slow it passed over us going west then it stopped hovered and was gone in the blink of an eye. on 12-25-09 i was watching the ufo marathon on the history ch. and they had a case where a man and his wife saw a ufo and some time later he found an implant in his arm, well this hit home with me because i have had this thing in my leg for as long as i can remember. so i'm thinking, could this thing in my leg be made of metal? so i get my metal detector out and shure enough it went off. could this be what i think it is?
content.summary: Very large craft with lights no sound moving slow then heading off at a high rate of speed

content.detailedDescription: My sister and i were outside smoking cigarettes after christmas dinner. (we eat it late!) it was quite a clear and starry night. my sister pointed something out in the sky behind me. i turned to look and saw a fairly bright orange light at what looked to me like a pretty high altitude - i would guess above 50,000 feet. it was moving extremely fast - too fast for any normal plane at such an altitude and it passed over our heads and away ino the distance within probably 20 to 30 seconds.  it appeared to pulsate as it flew, but i think that was down to odd wisps of clouds here and there partly obscuring it. my sister thought it was a meteorite which it could have been, but i ruled that theory out due to it not appearing to have an angle of descent or burning up. i said i thought it was some sort of secret high speed plane flying out at around mach 7 or 8. as it faded into the distance, i pointed out to my sister that i could hear a faint engine noise from it, but she said she couldn't hear it. the next morning, i checked google news for a any sightings, but there didn't appear to be any reports. so to sum up - i think i saw a secret plane and that someone thought that christmas day night would be a great time for flying it as they would have little chance of being seen due to people celebrating christmas.
content.summary: High altitude orange light moving extremely fast

content.detailedDescription: I was racing cars and i felt and see this thin fly over me so fast it got lost, i will like for you to call me .
content.summary: Fast

content.detailedDescription: While waiting for the port jefferson ferry in bridgeport ct, i opened the sunroof of our car to entertain my daughter.  i pointed out a seagull to her and noticed a silver sphere shaped object moving steadily across the sky at a high rate of speed and at a high altitude. i pointed it out to my wife and she observed the object as well. i could see it clearly for 15 seconds, my wife maybe 10. i have been tested at 20/15 vision and i had no obstruction of view. i believe we were facing east and the object was moving from north to south. we both agreed it wasnt an airplane or helicopter and definetly not a baloon. the object instantly vanished from sight, not out of view.  my wife is a skeptic but later admitted to it being a possible ufo.
content.summary: Silver sphere obeserved on coast.

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i observed what appeared to be a crop dusting plane flying in the distance at maybe 2 miles away.  i said to my passenger why would that plane be flying in the dark like that?  the blinking lights moved erradically from side to side at a high rate of speed.  as we aproached it came within 100 yards of us traveling west on hwy 18 and stopped out in the field at about 100' in the air.  we stopped on the side of the highway almost in shock and watched it for about 3-5 minutes.  thinking it could have been a helicopter i turned the car engine off to listen.  it seemed to just hover in place and made no noise at all.  after several minutes it started to move slowly away from us and accelerated to a high rate of speed in seconds moving out of sight to the sw in virtually seconds.  we couldn't see any detail although it was certainly close enough, but it looked to be a light cigar shaped glowing haze with 5 blinking lights.  3-5 minutes sitting on the side of the road that close with something so weird was an experience i'll never forget.  i would estimate the size to be maybe 150' wide and 50' high.  this was the first of 3 i have seen, (1975, 1976, and 1994) and my son witnessed one just a year ago in 2008.  all different.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Yellow light source with blinking lights on the side top and bottom 5

content.detailedDescription:
I live in alter valley and ride a klr 650 (a street legal dirt bike) so i ride alot on dirt roads and trails. i had been riding around and found a dead cow. i didnt see any obvious trauma or signs of disease. (i grew up on a cattle ranch in wyoming) after inspecting the carcass and not being able to determine anything i continued on. i rode to the top of a hill ( #1) and took some photos, came back down to continue on. within 2 minutes my bike died. i tried to start it and couldnt.  i got of my bike to take a look and as i removed my helmet a silver glint in the sky caught my eye. i grabbed my camera and was only able to take one photo before it disappeared.It was completely stationary and i observed it for aprox 30 to 60 seconds. if i had to guess at an altitude i would say several thousand feet. it was south west of me and looked to be over sasabe road south of three points. i heard no noise at all. i stood there for a minute just going over things in my head and then remembered that i was stranded. i tried to start my bike and it fired right up. 

the hill #1
lat=32.1404840446, lon=-111.290579283


position observed from

lat=32.1348177236, lon=-111.2807
content.summary: Metalic disc sighted over alter valley sept 2009

content.detailedDescription:
Due to coming down with a sinus infection, i was at home alone on christmas eve. i had cancelled my travel plans. my husband has flown off to see relatives and i had stayed behind but actually was enjoying my alone time.  i'd stayed awake a bit later than i had planned bc i had gotten engrossed in a kids' video that ended up being pretty entertaining.  due to my sinus infection, i had not been drinking.  in fact, it had been a couple of weeks since i had had any alcohol at all--including any over the counter cold remedies, which i do not believe in taking. i am trying to convey that i was alert, not in an agitated or fearful state (quite relaxed and happy, actually, having just walked the mile or so to and from winter haven to see the christmas decorations just a couple hours before) and stone cold sober.

i was in the master bedroom/bath area getting ready for bed, closing the blinds.  i was first looking out the window to make sure all was well in the back yard.  this was about 11:45pm christmas eve. i was facing north toward the catalina mountains. as i peered through the window, i saw multiple glowing points of orange light in the sky and thought, "oh, christmas eve fireworks.  nice. i'll watch for a bit."

but the lights didn't fade out the way fireworks do.  instead, they appeared to be alternately just hovering and then moving, slowly and steadily advancing in my general direction the way they would if they were the wing marker lights of civilian aircraft.  each of the lights was actually a pair of symmetrically sized and symmetrically arrayed lights.  the faa requires commerical planes to have a red light on one wing and a green light on the other.  that would explain one pair, maybe even a couple of pairs of lights advancing toward me.  if, for instance, i was watching multiple commercial planes advancing toward me, for whatever strange reason flying in formation.  but each of these pairs were orange. not a red or green light in sight.

maybe the military uses the dual orange light system, i thought.  if davis-monthan airforce base is in the south of town (it is, right?) then maybe these were military craft headed to dm, i thought.

but the flying pattern was not what you would expect of u.S. military or military vessels of any country.  one ship would hover close to another for a moment, then back off further away--then maybe hover nearer to another one.  this appeared to be a fleet of flying ships, but with very casual discipline if you could even call it discipline.  and i am not aware of any of our u.S. military planes being able to effortlessly reposition themelves in the pack the way these orange lighted ships were able to do.

"great," i thought.  "my husband's out of town so there's no other witness to corroborate my account--other than the several hundred five-year-olds gazing out their windows watching for eight tiny reindeer."  i considered going to a neighbor's house to get them out to see these lights/ships also, but i've never met either of the neighbors and i didn't want to be intrusive or have them think i am a wack job.

actually i am a college professor who teaches in the sciences and i am always scolding my students about the scientific method and data and evidence and how we are not to subscribe to a belief in anything for which we do not have empirical evidence and even then, we allow ourselves only a very provisional working hypothesis.  (this is why i was so stingy with the contact info above.  sorry.)

everything i've just described happened within a number of seconds (all these movements, all these thoughts).  my heart was pounding.  what if these are aliens, i thought.  i got anxious and turned off all the lights.  i stumbled out into the dark living room, fumbling for my digital camera i had left in my purse.  i clicked it on and fumbled with my keys (still in my jeans pocked since i hadn't yet gotten out of my clothing) and stepped out, without jacket, onto the back patio.  my heart was pounding.  could i get a picture before they disappeared?  a few had seemed to blink in and out of existence before, as i'd watched from the bedroom window.

i could see these ships (or whatever they were) flying steadily and slowly southward, while continuing to periodically lackadaisically rearrange themselves amongst their pack.  part hovering and part flying, it looked like.  i heard no sound other than a low hum, but couldn't remember the last time i'd stood on our back patio at night in the dark.  the low hum could be from machinery at the research complex just north of our property.

i clicked the shutter release button, only to be dismayed that because it was so dark, the shutter stayed open a really, really long time--maybe 12 seconds.  no way without a tripod could i hand-hold the camera still enough to capture what i was seeing.  sure enough, upon reviewing the shot, it looked like just orange squiggles.

i jacked up the iso/sensitivity to 3200.  but then the shot was, believe it or not, over exposed.  the sky was actually white.  and unfortunately, the shutter was still staying open so long, it was not possible to get a clear shot.

in shot #1, attached below, please ignore the red and green lights in the right-hand part of the frame.  those are christmas lights from the ronald mcdonald house up at campbell and allen.  the *orange* lights (well, squiggles) are the objects of interest.

this is a relatively new camera.  i struggled to remember how to activate the video-taking capability, which i had never activated previously.  i clicked the mode dial all the way to the end and, sure enough, that was where "video" is located.  i mashed the shutter release button, hoping that would start recording.  the display was a little ambiguous.  i couldn't tell if i was recording or not.  and then the ships/lights/whatever disappeared.  they didnt' seem to "fly away" but rather just vanish.

i was cold and went back inside. i spent a few minutes flossing my teeth and looked out the window again.  darkness.  and then another wave of the orange lights/ships appeared.  moving again in the same floating/advancing loose formation.  i went back to the living room, got my camera again and tried again with stills and video but it just seemed i wasn't getting anything. (playing both the videos on my computer just now, i see they each last only a few seconds and are just pitch black.  worthless.)

i tried to tell myself it was just military aircraft and nothing to be excited over, or fearful about.  at this point, having searched the web today with the search string "tucson ufo sighting 2009" and seeing nothing any more recent than dec. 1 (which didn't match my orange lights anyhow), i am feeling pretty despondent.  am i the only person (over age five) who noticed anything in the night sky over tucson last night?

please e-mail me.  thank you. 

mkm
content.summary: 6 - 8 orange pairs of lights hovering/flying in sky in non-strict formation

content.detailedDescription:
Despues de tomar dos fotos, sin tr���pode, de un atardecer, al revisarlas en el pc noto un destello con forma oval que aparentemente corresponde a un objeto con desplazamiento. en la primera la ubicaci���n y posici���n es diferente de la segunda toma. la coincidencia mas impactante esta en la forma ovaloide aparente de las nubes al fondo del atardecer , como simulando una gran nave, que fue lo que me llev��� a querer fotografiar esa figura. despues de revisar en el pc me sorprendi��� la luz que aparece en las dos tomas, ademas en posiciones diferentes. la diferencia entre ambas fotografias es de 35 segundos. 

estaba en mi residencia compartiendo con la familia.
cuando observ��� esa luz en las fotos, le compart��� a mi familia, quienes aceptaron que ese destello aparentemente es un objeto volador.
inmediatamente quise reportar sobre el asunto y acced��� a la internet, buscando donde consignar este evento.
el objeto tiene una forma ovalada, el cual no lo observ��� a simple vista.S���lo lo pude notar una vez quise abrir el archivo en mi pc. n���tese que la ubicaci���n del objeto es diferente entre una foto y la otra.
creo que he sido afortunado con este suceso.
content.summary: Objeto volador que aparece en la foto de un atardecer no visual a la mis ojos

content.detailedDescription:
In the early morning hours following easter we were returning from a family event in western ma. the evening was calm but there were low in the early morning hours following easter we were returning from a family event in western ma. the evening was calm but there were low clouds.
as we turned on to our street we noticed lights, like the headlights of a small plane in the sky towards the end of our street where our home was located ( my x partner still lives there) as we drove further down the street we both commented that we thought it was very low, and did not look like it was moving. as we approached the corner where our house was located we could see the craft in the sky above our home. my partner refused to get out of the car, but i got out and looked up at the craft, it was hovering only about 150 to 200 feet above me, the metal was like a shiny silver, but smooth with no hard edges, it was making a loud swooshing sound like air being forced through a small hole, i looked around to see if any neighbors were observing but all was quiet. it then slowly began to tilt to one side i could see more of its shape and size, it was maybe only about 40 feet long and 15 to 20 feet wide, with a solid strip of lights at its rear, i also noticed what looked like a protrusion on its top more to the front but that also looked solid and smooth, it slowly moved upwards with no change in its sound, then like a streak of lighting disappeared. i called the naval air station in brunswick maine the next day, and asked if any military craft was present in my area, they said no. i also thought it was a strange story to tell for it was just a few days before that a group of people committed mass suicide in ca. waiting to be taken away by a ufo during the hal bop comet.
content.summary: First saw the lihtgs of what we thought was a low flying plane, then noticed it was not moving.

content.detailedDescription: in feb of '83 while stationed at the national training center, ft irwin ca. myself and sfc grissett were driving into barstow from base. shortly after leaving the reservation we were west of and just north of the coyote dry lake bed. i observed a strung out,lazy s formation of seven yellowish/amber orbs along the northwestern edge of the lakebed,runing in an easterly direction which was off to my left. pulling off the right hand side of the road,we both exited the vehicle and started talking to each other about what we were looking at. we were both part of the ntcs alpha company operations group,"observer controllers" in that we were used as trainers for the units that rotated thru the ntc,and were expected to be able to acurately report,in detail,actions of the soldiers we observed. as we watched these objects,we went down a mental checklist of "who,what,where,when,and what are we doing" standard "spot report" proceedures,and a lot of things were unanswerable,such as,if they were producing light as we were seeing,how high were these orbs,as we could not determine any groundlit area under them.The orbs bobbed in position,floating up and down slightly,and seperating in distance between each other only slightly, and the soft curves in the lazy s formation changed little.We both cussed the fact that our binoculars were in the barracks,as we were hard pressed to determine the distance to them,we believed it to be no more than 1/2 mile,as well as we could determine from the terrain along the lakebed that we could see,and were highly frustrated as we couldn't identify what we were seeing.These orbs "floated & bobbed" in this position,with no seemingly purpose or direction until the orb in the most easterly direction moved away from the rest about 2-3 orb widths,and faster than i can describe,headed down from the group,towards the ground,and at the same time began to shrink in size until it winked out,at the same time it winked out, the remaining six blinked out completely,gone,zip. sfc grissett said "lad,i think we'ed best be off now." when we returned later that night, i called range control at bycicle lake air field and questioned about any traffic at coyote lake, as that was off the military resevation. when asked about what i had seen,the nco on duty said,"oh,them, they won't hurt 'cha unless you try and chase 'em and in the dark,lotsa luck" when i pushed him about the lights, he told me they were flares, hogwash i said. he then asked me if i was military, and when i said i was an sfc with ops grp, he said "sarge,they are flares and dats the name of that tune". i was stationed there from '82 until '85 and observed the same orbs in several different locations, in several diferent fromations,and when reported received the same reply "sarge,leave it alone,they are flares".I spent over 24 years in combat arms and during tank gunnery, was exposed to hundreds of "flares" during night fireing, these were not flares.
content.summary: Yellowish/amber floating orbs

content.detailedDescription:
Background info: at the time of the event, i was about twelve and in the sixth grade. my family was living on an acreage in northwest iowa, six miles from the nearest town.  at the time we were renovating the second level of our house, and my bedroom was the only room on that floor.
the encounter: one night, at approximately 2:00a.M. i woke up in a cold sweat, because the sound of someone in my room had woken me. living in the middle of nowhere, my room was usually very dark, but when i liked into the darkness, it was obvious that there was a small red light, blinking at a steady rate, much like a low battery light on a smoke-detector or record light on a handy-cam. the light seemed to hover about four feet off the ground and two to three feet away from my bed. the next distinctive thing i noticed were two thin cylindrical poles, in an a-formation under the light. the cylindrical poles were composed of a highly reflective ���silvery��� metal, much like aluminum. beyond this ���apparatus��� and light, i saw nothing.
for a moment i was frozen in terror because i thought that someone had broken into our house and was videotaping me. as i lay there, i had this horrible feeling that this had happened before. in a panic, i kicked at the apparatus. my toe made contact with one of the poles. it was hard, cold, and metallic. instantly, the light blinked out, there was a sound, like that of a power-drill, and the two poles snapped together (parallel with each other and perpendicular to the ground) and moved approximately two feet farther from me. it was then that i ran from the room and down the stairs (i used the west stairs, since the apparatus was between me and the rest of the second level) and into my parents��� room (which at the time of the renovation had an open view of the front yard). once downstairs, i heard footsteps going from my room to the master bedroom. there was a loud series of crashes followed by silence. after about thirty seconds, there a bright light flashed across our front yard. the origin of the light seemed be on, or near, our roof. the light moves from above our house and crossed southwest with astonishing speed and vanished. all the while, the ���aircraft��� never made any noise loud enough to be heard from the downstairs.
convinced that spies had broken into our house to video tape me, i woke my dad, and recounted the story to him. he dismissed the encounter as a nightmare and went back to sleep. the next morning, however, we discovered the east door to my bedroom was open. which was unusual because we kept it closed to keep my room warm, since the rest of that floor was drafty, due to the renovations . we also found the screen to the front window in the master bedroom had been removed, and a shelf of paint had been tipped over. i assumed this to be the source of the loud crashing, but more importantly, evidence that it was more than just a nightmare.
for years, i kept the encounter to myself and close friends, for fear of ridicule. i honestly believed the encounter to have been someone videotaping. until i watched a show about alien encounters on the discovery channel. now, i don���t know what to think about it. but i am not ruling out extra terrestrial involvement as a possibility.

interesting aftermath: since the encounter, i have been prone to sleepwalking. episodes have been as extreme as waking in a field or waking while driving. the most bizarre episode occurred when hypnotized at a school party, senior year. the hypnotist suggested that we were seeing aliens and ufo���s. he then suggested others would deny that the ufo���s were alien. when a friend suggested they were not alien, i became violent and had to be induced to the ���sleep��� state of hypnosis again.
content.summary: An unexplained combination of lights and sounds in the middle of the night.

content.detailedDescription:
During part of my career as a law enforcement officer i was a helicopter pilot in the wayne county sheriff aviation unit.  sometime between 1974 and 1978, in the summer time, during night patrol, we were requested by inkster pd to check an area around beech daly and michigan ave for a low flying aircraft, several complaints.

as we approached the area flying about 700 ft agl we observed nothing in the area. if the aircraft was flying lower than we were, we would be unable to see it���s running lights against the background of the city lights so i slowed the helicopter and dropped down to just above the tree tops. suddenly we observed a dark object, shape unknown, no lights, hovering at about 400 ft agl, in the rough area reported. 

the object was between us and dtw, and we were in the control zone. i reported the object to metro tower and asked them if they had the object on radar. they stated negative. about that time the object shot up and away, almost instantly to a point about 5000 ft over dtw where it was hovering and was now shiny but we still couldn���t make out a shape. i again asked metro tower if they had him on radar which they replied negative. 

right after that, the object disappeared
content.summary: Sighted fast moving, undetected object near airport

content.detailedDescription:
On the way home from a softball game my father was playing in at a near by town my brother mother and i drove into our driveway where my father was standing outside looking and pointing in the air.

  when we got out of the car my father said look up there. when we did we say a disc flying around above our house. it had red blue and white lights and flying very slow. too slow to be a plane to maintain flight. there was a humming sound coming from the object.

  i felt surprised and excited to see such a thing as would any kid would be. i was about ten or eleven years old at the time and it felt special. there was no fear in me or my brother. my parents however was a different story. as with most parents they were thinking about our saftey.

  the object flew away over the river and trees in our back yard. at that point we all jumped in the car to follow it.  as we crossed the bridge and rose over a small hill to a 2 mile straight away we saw the object hovering over three large steel grain bins. it stayed there for about five minutes. during that time the humming noise could be heard as my brother and i rolled down our windows and started to wave and say hi to the object. my mother was not pleased and told us to roll up our windows. 

  a few minutes later the object began to move toward us slowly and lowered it's altitudeand passed right over our car. it was about ten feet over our car as it passed.

  we turned aroud and the object took off at a high rate of speed and climbing.  it was then that we say two more objects of the same nature off further in the sky. until they dissapeared in the night. my mother contacted the local airforce base and asked if they were test flying of course they sad no. i will never forget it as long as i live. i don't believe there was any lost time during the incident.
content.summary: 3 disc shaped objects with red blue and white lights hovering and flying.

content.detailedDescription:
In the summer of 1967 or 1968, my friend tim and i were sitting in a pickup truck watching for bears in a garbage dump on werth road, just outside alpena mi. it was 10:00 pm or so when tim saw a moving light, kind of like a distant star, on the horizon far to the east of us. what surprised us to begin with was it reversed and went backwards then reversed again as if on a string. tim had a spot light with a dc-10 landing light in it and he flashed it at the dot of light. after a moment, we could see that the object was coming toward us and tim continued to shine the light at it.

we got out of the pickup and got onto the roof. the object traveled to a point that appeared to be high in the sky directly above us. the object then appeared to be getting bigger and bigger and we realized it was descending. it got to a point where the spotlight was able to reach the bottom of the ���craft��� which we could now see was saucer shaped.

earlier in the evening we were outside our cabin on beaver lake and used the spot to light up the woods on the other side of the lake. where we were, the lake is about ��� of a mile across, so we guessed the ���craft��� was about 3500 to 4000 feet above us. there was no noise and no downdraft. suddenly a light emitted from the ���craft���, like a spot light but looked florescent, right down on us and only lit up the area of the truck, not the surrounding area. 

at that point we jumped down and into the truck and got out of there. we drove a couple miles west to a little known town of spratt, which had a bar and laundromat. in the parking lot of the bar was a payphone. we called the michigan state police and told them what happened. they told us to wait for a car to respond. we could still see the ���craft��� hovering over the dump area. 

a little while later a dnr vehicle showed up and asked if we were the ones who had an animal complaint. he said there wasn���t an available car in the area so he was sent but they didn���t tell him what it was about. we told him the story and pointed out the ���craft��� that was still there. he got on the radio and advised what he had and that it was still there. a short while later, the dispatcher advised him that alpena afb, grayling and travers city said nothing was on radar, as the three of us stood there watching it. he took our information and we all left.

the next morning, a state trooper knocked on our cabin door and advised us we were to go into alpena afb, that they wanted to talk to us.

when we arrived, officers from the voodoo witch fighter squadron separately interviewed us and were both asked to draw pictures of what we saw.

several months later we received an in depth questionnaire from wright patterson afb. we both filled them out and returned them and that is the last we ever heard of it.
content.summary: Unknown silent circular craft shined light on us.

we got out of the pickup and got onto the roof. the object traveled to a point that appeared to be high in the sky directly above us. the object then appeared to be getting bigger and bigger and we realized it was descending. it got to a point where the spotlight was able to reach the bottom of the ���craft��� which we could now see was saucer shaped.

earlier in the evening we were outside our cabin on beaver lake and used the spot to light up the woods on the other side of the lake. where we were, the lake is about ��� of a mile across, so we guessed the ���craft��� was about 3500 to 4000 feet above us. there was no noise and no downdraft. suddenly a light emitted from the ���craft���, like a spot light but looked florescent, right down on us and only lit up the area of the truck, not the surrounding area. 

at that point we jumped down and into the truck and got out of there. we drove a couple miles west to a little known town of spratt, which had a bar and laundromat. in the parking lot of the bar was a payphone. we called the michigan state police and told them what happened. they told us to wait for a car to respond. we could still see the ���craft��� hovering over the dump area. 

a little while later a dnr vehicle showed up and asked if we were the ones who had an animal complaint. he said there wasn���t an available car in the area so he was sent but they didn���t tell him what it was about. we told him the story and pointed out the ���craft��� that was still there. he got on the radio and advised what he had and that it was still there. a short while later, the dispatcher advised him that alpena afb, grayling and travers city said nothing was on radar, as the three of us stood there watching it. he took our information and we all left.

the next morning, a state trooper knocked on our cabin door and advised us we were to go into alpena afb, that they wanted to talk to us.

when we arrived, officers from the voodoo witch fighter squadron separately interviewed us and were both asked to draw pictures of what we saw.

several months later we received an in depth questionnaire from wright patterson afb. we both filled them out and returned them and that is the last we ever heard of it.
content.summary: Unknown silent circular craft shined light on us.

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting at a local lake in anacortes,washington called heart lake. i was sitting in the driver seat of my car with two of my friends talking about new holidays and enjoying ourselves when me and my passenger and close mate noticed a flare like light with a very red,orange, and yellow array fading in and out, about no more then twenty feet in front of us, just across this small gap within the lake and no higher then right above eyes height if not even. the feeling was almost as if you couldn't move, all of us in the car noticed this and were very open with each other the whole time as we noticed the object just moving throughout the trees in complete darkness slowly getting really bright then dimming but staying in the same area almost coming forward and backward. the feeling of fear was something my friends and i had never felt before, and all of us being skeptics but open minded, this was an new experience. i open the door to my car that was the most it felt i could do, my two buddies were just fixated on the thing, i got my leg and head out and can not explain the gravitational feeling just abnormally strong and different from anything i have ever felt.
the craft was smaller as i got a better look, then as if the feeling got like i and the object were too close and the thing noticed and shot straight up into the sky and disappeared. the object appeared as a comet and actually nocked me enough to get me to sit down, back in the car. if you have read this the strangest part is my friends can barely recall what happen, no drugs or alcohol were involved, both of my friends had filmed the craft but all are cellphones were erased literally all the pictures and vid on my phone were gone.If you read this and have are interested in this subject i have been very interested in learning more about what happen and how i can recall this and my buddies cant. you may email me if you are interested about this story or if you have anymore questions about this event.

thank you,

garrett bollaert
content.summary: Flare like, flashed in and out of woods, comet looking at trajectory

content.detailedDescription:
The following is true.
i love helicopters and one day july of 2008 about 2:00 pm. i heard a helicopter coming so i ran to my window to watch it fly by. after it flew by i saw a very bright light high in the sky just hovering there. i watched it moving very very slowly towards me for about 45 minutes, as it moved just above my window i saw two round disk one right behind the other. two days later looking out my window hoping to see it again i saw hovering only about 14 feet off the ground and only about 50 feet away from me something that looked like a prob. this was absolutly amazing, i was like oh my god what is that? this also was in the middle of the day. it was round the color of aluminum foil and it had only one wing on the top of it, it was about 4 feet round. it was just hovering there looking at me for about 15 seconds and then it just took off to the right until i couldn't see it any more under its own power. there was no propeller. i could not believe what i was seeing. then again two days later, i was sleeping. i never sleep on my back, but woke up in the middle of the night on my back with my right arm and left leg completly num. i had absolutly no feeling in them at all. it took me 5 minutes to get my moter functions back and to my surprise my left ear drum was in alot of pain. after a few day the pain in my ear goes away and i start having severe headaches. the headaches lasted for 4 days and then just went away. keep in mind i never ever get bad headaches. remember when i woke up on my back and my ear drum was hurting? well the pain in my ear drum came back and i started hearing a tinging sound in my left ear that would last from a minute to a minute and a half. they would come and go all though out the day. this lasted for about 8 months. today i still hear the tinging sound but its not as often. to this day i feel that i have a alian inplant in my left ear.
content.summary: I saw a round object hovering at about 4000 feet moving very slowly towards me.

content.detailedDescription: Mcallen, tx 1994: i don't recall the date but remember i was not at school at the time. i was 17 years old, at the time. i remember my brother was watching a superman movie so, being bored, i decided to go outside for a while. out to the side of our house we had a swing set. i decided i would sit on it for awhile. i begun to sing to myself. after a few minutes i noticed something in the sky, out of the side of my eye. i turned to see a ship like i've only seen on tv. it was a ufo. "oh my god," i thought. i had always wanted to see one to see if they were real but never in my life did i believe i would. the ship was saucer shape. the best i could describe it is like two plates enclosed on each other and a bowl upside down on them. it had lights (blue, red, and yellow or white) consecutively next to each other all around the edge of the ship, just like seen on tv. aso, like on tv, it had the white light circling around it. however,  i noticed the white light circling the ship was not actually touching the ship it was flying independently directly over the blue, red and white lights. lookingup at it the ship was spinning clock-wise while the white tear drop shape white light flew counter clock-wise. the ship was flying south bound and it seemed as if it was out of clontrol as it wobbled in the sky. it was flying slowly and i really wanted to examine it more, fearing that i would never get to see one again. i don't know why but i begun to mentally will it to slow down or stop and as i did, to my surprise, it did. the ship significantly begun to slow down right away. i don't know how this was flown be it with hand controls, buttons, or verbally at that moment i begun to believe that they are flown using mental control. this would make sence because if it flies as fast as they are suppose to and make the crazy moves they do it would make sense to me they are willed. i feel that by looking at the ship that whomever was flying it was in training. it seemed to me that because the ship seemed like it was out of control and by having me mentally will it to slow down and it did i feel like i was close enough to have a small influence on it that the person flying it. ti be totally honest i feel, knowing there is an air force base near the city we have to have another site with these machines hidden for military training and use. also because in thr same area i saw three different ufo's with other people with me to witness them enough times to be a coincedent. anyway, as the present saucer comtinued south it was headed towards a big tree. i decided as soon as i lose sight of it being behind the tree i would run and grab someone. i did. i pulled my brother out and pointed to the sky at which point he yelled out, "holy [cms/tg/pd]! a ufo!" it shot off at that point, south bound.
content.summary: Saucer shape machine flew silent over the sky of south texas.

content.detailedDescription: It was halloween and me and four friends we on the roof looking at the stars and throwing down candy to the kinds that came by. we were on 38th street and east cliff dr. we were right on the monterey bay and could see the ocean from the roof. i looked into the sky and what looked like the space shuttle re interring the atmosphere was anything but that. it came in at an odd angle and as it became clearer to the naked eye, small clumps of fire or debris starting coming off the edges. in direction it made a arch on entry and came even closer to us. on this night in santa cruz ca it was a perfectly clear and still night. the only thing you could see in the sky was one lone cloud hovering over the middle of the monterey bay.  it was a small cloud and as this ufo came closer to us and you were able to see the refined edges, it entered this cloud. when it entered the cloud the red and yellow fire color you could see no longer.  we all stood in amazement asking ourselves what this could possibly be. about one minute passed and as we looked on this object moved out of the cloud, resembling a star like presence, round, soft, circular, but moving to the west over the ocean. a steady pace, if i were to guess at about 200 or 300 miles per hour. it was almost as if it used the cloud to cool off if that makes any sense. it kept moving to the west until we could not see it any more. i would have said it was a plane, or some other kind of military craft, but there were no blinking safety lights, and so sound.
content.summary: Fireball upon entry, soft star like glow after exiting cloud

content.detailedDescription:
"narrative below was submitted by mufon dispatch for witness based on phone conversation with witness."

witness was driving on his way to california about an hour outside las cruces, new mexico when at approximately 10:55 am he spotted an undefined black object hovering in the southern sky. witness had a difficult time trying to describe any shape to the object and could not estimate the distance of the object from him or its elevation. he said he had been watching it for about 30 minutes and it was still visible while he was reporting it to dispatch.
content.summary: Hovering black object.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were driving( in separate cars)along turnpike road near the intersection of moose meadow road in willington, ct when we observed a stationary blue circular object just above the tree line ahead of us. the object then made a short movement from left to right and stopped briefly then it zig and zag and just speed out of sight heading away from us in the direction we were driving. my wife does not really believe in ufo's but the next day as i as i started to tell our son about what i saw, my wife interrupted me and said she meant to tell what she had seen and she described the exact thing i had seen. the object did not move either  in the direction or speed of any aircraft i have ever seen. i did observe two blueish object way off in the distance as i proceeded down turnpike road and turned onto westford hill road in ashford. they were not airplanes as they remained stationary in the sky. they did appear to have a red light but they were far enough away that i could not make out any other details with the naked eye. they were not stars either. i believed at that time that it was likely a ufo. i looked up another ufo web site saw a drawing showing a blue globe/circular object(ufo) that looked exactly like what both my wife and i saw. on tuesday evening december 22, 2009 my son and i were out on our back deck using his i phone to look at/id constellations when directly along the tree line looking north a orange/yellow fireball zoomed across the sky from the east to west. it looked like the scene out of the move armageddon. not sure what it was. we did observe other shooting stars--typical white light streaks.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Blue circular shape

content.detailedDescription:
My name is mike williams i am an american living in ireland and as i was driving to a gig in a village called redcastle ( im a professional musician) i noticed these lights, at first i thought they were road lights but as i approached they were in a triangle shape formation i noticed they were too high off the ground to be road lights.
i stop the car get out and looked up at them there was no sound nothing no animals nothin, i get my phone out and call my buddy frank up as i couldnt believe what i was seeing, as im telling frank whats going on 2 of em decide to slowly bank to the right up and out over the river foyle very slowly the cloud cover was kinda low and they just went up over the river and then up thru the clouds and got dimmer as they did so, now they didnt move until i got my phone out talking to frank the 3rd one just sat there as im explaining to frank it decide to do the same thing but in the opposite direction to the left, they had this round cut off teardrop shape and had the color of flame no sound came from these things nothin.
all of em ascended up and over the river going to the opposite side but up thru the clouds and out of sight. i got the distinct impression that as i was watching them they was watching me! if they had been on the ground they would be fairly big things, i havent seen these things since but have noticed strange colored twinkling lights that look like stars but are too low in the night sky to be stars
. i have a radio show and mentioned it over the air but nobody called in to say they seen anything on that night, thats what happened and i seen these things im am not tripping it happened.

thanks for your time mike williams
ps. im will use my address in california as it wont accept the info for state field and i am tired of rewriting this thing ;-)
my address where this took place is:
3 pound st business park
carndonagh co. donegal ireland 
the time 9:10pm gmt ireland (dublin) 30th of august 2009
this is where i live
my phone is: 353-86-052-4633
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 3 flame colored teardropped shaped objects over the foyle river in inishowen donegal ireland

content.detailedDescription:
This report was filed by dispatch on behalf of witness.

witness reported seeing an illuminated, large, cylindrical object at a distance of about 10-20 miles away. he estimated the object's size as three
times that of a commercial airliner, and said it looked like a 737 with no
wings. after watching for several minutes, the object disappeared from view
as he was watching it. this witness has a history of ufo events going back
several decades, and also mentioned incidents of finding what he believes
may have been implants on his body, which eventually disappeared.
content.summary: This report was filed by dispatch on behalf of witness.

content.detailedDescription: We noticed a orange fog rising above the swamp and creek slowley following the creek. then stopped.Got brighter. lights flashing. then a beam of clear light focused on our cabin we had a fan running the beam focused on the fan and you could see clearly through the ceiling and roof  for a minute or so we sat quitely nobody said anything. then the beam retracted, and slowley the object left out of sight. we were camping out over the weekend.  nobody mentioned it again,until the next weekend
content.summary: Orange.Opaque,small lights red blue green

content.detailedDescription: In february 1976, i was enroute from san francisco to new jersey to work on constructing a nuclear power plant. i am a graduate civil engineer and i was employed as an upper level engineer by an international engineering-construction company who had transferred me from the trans alaska pipeline to this nuclear power project in new jersey. i was on the interstate bridge that crossed the mississippi river driving east near sunset on saturday, february 14, 1976, in memphis, tennessee. this was the first time i had seen the mississippi river. as i was taking in the sights, i noticed a large "structure" in the distance that was slowly revolving and had slowly pulsing lights, much like a communication tower but it was too broad, it was rotating and it had multi-colored pulsing lights. that caught my eye. i was looking east at the "structure" away from the sunset so it was hard to see the mass of the "structure". the portion of the "structure" i could see was about a thousand feet above the ground. the "structure" (defined by a dim outline and the pulsing lights) made a precise vertical rise of an estimated 200-300 hundred feet and then a precise vertical descent of about the same distance. at this point i was straining to see what supported this "structure" that was making this precise movement. i could not see any mass or structural support under the portion defined by the dim outline of the "object's" mass and the pulsing lights. i realized then this was not a "structure" but it was an "object" and there was nothing supporting it. it then began an exact horizontal movement to the west for a few hundred feet and then an exact horizontal movement to the east. i decided to get off the interstate and get directly underneath the "object" to get a better look at it and to confirm to myself there was no structural support from the ground. as i was exiting the interstate, the "object" began an exact horizontal move to the west. the"object" moved slowly at first, then accelerated at an astonishing rate of speed toward the west until it disappeared from sight. the sun was still visible in the west. the speed of its departure was so quick that i was still on the exit ramp while watching it disappear in the distance. i heard no sound from its departure nor did i see any evidence of propulsion devices. i later performed a calculation to estimate the average speed at which the "object" departed. i estimate that the time it took to travel from a standstill until it disappeared from sight in the west was at least 2 seconds but not more than 4 seconds. the visibility was at least 100 miles and probably more. that means the average speed the "object" traveled in this distance was at least 90,000 mph and possibly 180,000 mph. if the visibility was 200 miles, these speeds would be doubled to 180,000 mph minimum and possibly 360,000 mph. the mass of the "object" was difficult to see when i was viewing it in the east and it departed so quickly that i only viewed the mass for a few seconds. however, this is what i saw. the "object" was disc shaped. i estimate its girth at 300-400 feet. the thickness at the middle of the disc was around 100 feet. i believe the "object"; to be circular at its girth as it was slowly rotating without any change in its outline. it had multi-colored slowly pulsing lights (yellow, green, and red) on its girth and elsewhere on the mass. i continued traveling on the interstate for a few more hours and spent the night a couple of hundred miles east of memphis, tennessee. i could not obtain a copy of any of the memphis newspapers to find out if the sighting was reported and published. i have not been back to memphis since then, but i always hoped to be able to return there some day and research the archive newspapers to read about the sighting. with the advent of the internet, i performed a search for ufo sightings on the 2/14/76 date to see if someone else had witnessed and recorded the sighting. the only information i found was about a ufo crash near cubatao river, brazil 2/14/76 recorded by ((a well-known ufo investigator)). at the rate of speed i observed the "object" to be capable of traveling, it could very easily have traveled from memphis to brazil in a few minutes. i tried to find out more information about the crash in brazil but to date i have been unsuccessful. i certainly would appreciate a response from anyone who (or knows of anyone who) experienced the memphis, tennessee ufo, or who knows about the brazil ufo crash.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Mothership sighting over memphis tennesee on february 14, 1976

content.detailedDescription: On dec 12,about 1:00 in the afternoon,i was walking into a department store when something shinny caught my eye....I glanced at it at first and then i took a double take....It was a shinny disc wobbling...Almost like it was in trouble......It was a clear blue sky out....Not a cloud to be seen....This disc that was wobbling was appearing and then dissapearing in the blue sky....When it would re-appear ,a white cloud was around it,  ,the cloud or steam quickly disappered revieling the disk.....Then it seemed like it just turned blue like the sky.....Did not move side to side just up and down....Hard to explain.......This went on for about 3 minutes....I was looking around for someone to share this with but no one was there ...My first ufo sighting...It was shinny silver with darker lines from side to side.....It was wobbling pretty good...If anyone was in it ,they were throwing their guts up...Thanks for listening...Mike
content.summary: Wobbling disk in clear blue sky

content.detailedDescription: I was outside smoking a joint. and i was like wow wtf! santa? (cause i heard some commotion on my nieghbors roof). i looked and this fat guy was riding in a sled pulled by some deers with antlers.  than he sprinkled some magic dust and a lighter fell at my feet. and than i was like thanks "dude"! than i went inside and passed out. i told my wife but she doesnt believe me.
content.summary: Sled bieng pulled by reindeer

content.detailedDescription:
After extremely deep meditation i went into my bathroom to look at my 
eyes in the mirror.  looking out the bathroom window i saw a teardrop ufo with red and white strobe lights.  this ufo was about 200 ft in the sky moving slowly towards my position along n. verity pkwy.  the ufo appeared to be wobbly.  i felt a psychic connection and at first felt confronted.  i mentally challenged the ufo that if it came to cause me harm than may it crash.  when it didn't crash i felt at peace.  i reasoned that the slowness and wobbly motion of the ufo was meant to be non-threatening.  i watched for a couple minutes then went back to bed.  

the night before during meditation i convinced myself that i disrupted the strange electronic hum that was interfering in my extremely deep meditation.  this hum was strangly hypnotic with its cyclic nature.  i concentrated on this hum and "introduced" random energy into the cycle making it unstable.  afterward i noticed all the lights on the towers around had an erratic nature to their strobing cycle. perhaps the 
power disruption attracted this ufo to my position the following night.
content.summary: Strange pyschic event.  afterward looked outside saw wobbly teardrop ufo up 200 ft. in sky slowly heading straight for me.
